Settings

Current hotkey:

Pressing the hotkey immediately expands the snippet present before the cursor. A hotkey can be composed of any button on the keyboard (optionally, in combination with Shift/Ctrl/Alt)

Auto-Insert character pairs

On typing one of the letters below (say `(`), its complement (`)`), is automatically inserted after it, and the caret (cursor) in positioned between both of them

When enabled, you can type a dot (.) followed by a snippet name to expand it. For example, typing ".table" and pressing space will expand the "table" snippet.

Theme Settings

Switch between light and dark color themes for the extension interface.
